Laser

Contains logic for interacting with IPG Lasers **/ open subprog Laser(void) return;

Functions
Reset(void)

// check for any faults, try to clear, see if ok // start laser diodes // open all shutters local resetOK;

callsub sub.ClearFaults(); dwell0

return;

AbortNow(void)

callsub sub.ClearFaults(); return;

/*** sub: Shutdown Shut down the laser diodes

ClearFaults
call Laser.ClearFaults();

Attempt to clear laser faults

SetControlMode
call Laser.SetControlMode(
value
);

Set the SPI Laser control mode

Parameters
value

the desired control mode

GetControlMode
call Laser.GetControlMode();

Get the SPI Laser control mode

TurnLaserOff
call Laser.TurnLaserOff();

Turn off the laser

EnableLaser
call Laser.EnableLaser();

Turn on the laser

SetLaserPowerAsPercentages

Set the laser power to a percentage of its maximum power

Parameters
value

the percentage of total laser power

See Also

  • Laser.SetPowerAsPercentage

StartLaser
call Laser.StartLaser();

Start the laser

value
